DOC.brief_title: ENERGI-F703 Diabetic Foot Ulcers Phase II Study
DOC.criteria: 1 . With either gender age least 20 year old 2 . With diabetic mellitus ( DM ; currently DM medication treatment na√Øve DM subject duplicate HbA1c 6.5 % fast plasma glucose 126 mg/dL measure least one week apart Screening ) 3 . If two ulcer large size grade , one long duration select . 4 . The target ulcer classify grade 1 3 ulcer accord Wagner Grading System ulcer size 1 cm2 50 cm2 ( Grade 3 ulcer subject may enter study debridement , abscess target ulcer control investigator 's discretion osteomyelitis present ) 5 . Subject free necrosis infection soft bone tissue ; 6 . Subject sign write informed consent form 1 . With active osteomyelitis 2 . With target ulcer size decrease least 30 % least 2 week standardofcareonly period record regular therapy Randomization visit 3 . With poor nutritional status ( albumin < 2g/dl ) , poor diabetic control ( HbA1c > 12 % ) , leukocyte count < 2,000/mm3 , abnormal liver function ( AST , ALT > 3 x upper limit normal range ) 4 . Requiring treatment systemic corticosteroid , immunosuppressive chemotherapeutic agent 5 . With know suspected hypersensitivity ingredient study product vehicle 6 . With coronary heart disease myocardial infarction , coronary artery bypass graft ( CABG ) , percutaneous transluminal coronary angioplasty ( PTCA ) within 3 month prior study 7 .
